Alien - Class in lifeform
 
Alien(String, int) - Constructor for class lifeform.Alien
Aliens recreated with a RecoveryBehavior are RecoveryNone by default Aliens have an attack strength of 10, by default Aliens have a recovery Rate of 0 (will never recover) by default
Alien(String, int, RecoveryBehavior) - Constructor for class lifeform.Alien
Aliens have an attack strength of 10, by default Aliens have a recovery Rate of 0 (will never recover) by default
Alien(String, int, RecoveryBehavior, int) - Constructor for class lifeform.Alien
Aliens have an attack strength of 10, by default

AttachmentException - Exception in exceptions
 
AttachmentException(String) - Constructor for exception exceptions.AttachmentException
 
attack(LifeForm, int) - Method in class lifeform.LifeForm
attack another Lifeform with full attack strength if the attacker has a weapon with ammo, the weapon will be used if the attacker has no weapon or the weapon is out of ammo, the ranged touch attack (hand to hand attack strength) will be used ranged touch attack will only work within a distance less than or equal to 5 weapon attacks will work only within the range of the weapon used

execute() - Method in class state.AIContext
execute the current state's action
execute(int, int) - Method in class command.Acquire1Cmd
If a lifeform is in cell (row, col), the lifeform will pick up weapon#1 (if available) If the lifeform is currently holding a weapon, it will be swapped for weapon#1 If there is no lifeform in the cell, nothing happens.
execute(int, int) - Method in class command.Acquire2Cmd
If a lifeform is in cell (row, col), the lifeform will pick up weapon#2 (if available) If the lifeform is currently holding a weapon, it will be swapped for weapon#2 If there is no lifeform in the cell, nothing happens.
execute(int, int) - Method in class command.AttackCmd
if a lifeform exists at the row, col coordinates it will attack the first lifeform encountered in a straight line, as long as it is in its attack range
execute(int, int) - Method in interface command.Command
 
execute(int, int) - Method in class command.DropCmd
If there is a lifeform holding a weapon in cell (row, col), try to drop the weapon.
execute(int, int) - Method in class command.MoveCmd
If a lifeform exists in the cell (row, col), moves an object at max speed in it's current direction the lifeform will not move off the board or into an occupied square.
execute(int, int) - Method in class command.ReloadCmd
if the cell at (row, col) contains a lifeform with a weapon, the weapon is realoded if the cell has no lifeform, or the lifeform has no weapon, nothing happens
execute(int, int) - Method in class command.TurnEastCmd
if there is a lifeform in cell (row, col), turns it to face south
execute(int, int) - Method in class command.TurnNorthCmd
if there is a lifeform in cell (row, col), turns it to face North
execute(int, int) - Method in class command.TurnSouthCmd
if there is a lifeform in cell (row, col), turns it to face south
execute(int, int) - Method in class command.TurnWestCmd
if there is a lifeform in cell (row, col), turns it to face south
executeAction() - Method in class state.ActionState
 
executeAction() - Method in class state.DeadState
If the LifeForm had a weapon then remove that weapon and place it in a random Cell in the Environment (that has space).
executeAction() - Method in class state.HasWeaponState
Evaluation: If valid target in range call attackTarget.
executeAction() - Method in class state.NoWeaponState
Evaluation: Check if I'm dead first.
executeAction() - Method in class state.OutOfAmmoState
Evaluation: If not dead, call reload method.

F

fire(int) - Method in class weapon.Attachment
Most attachments will change the damage the weapon does when it fires
fire(int) - Method in class weapon.ChainGun
a ChainGun's damage increases the farther away the target is (as long as it is in range)
fire(int) - Method in class weapon.GenericWeapon
fire at a target that is some distance away.
fire(int) - Method in class weapon.Pistol
 
fire(int) - Method in class weapon.PlasmaCannon
a Plasma Cannonc's damage decreases with each shot fired
fire(int) - Method in class weapon.PowerBooster
 
fire(int) - Method in class weapon.Scope
Scopes increase the maxRange of the base Weapon, which may or may not be used to calculate its damage Scopes also increase a weapon's power ScopeDamage = BaseDamage*((maxRange - distance)/maxRange)
fire(int) - Method in class weapon.Stabilizer
A Stabilizer auto reloads if ammo is at 0 after firing A Stabilizer also increases the Weapon's damage by 25%
fire(int) - Method in interface weapon.Weapon
Fire the weapon once, this reduces the current ammo by one bullet
